interpretation:
The Purple Circle is a card that represents spirituality, mystery, and intuition. It is a symbol of awareness, reminding us to look beyond the surface and tap into our inner wisdom. This card suggests that we should trust our intuition and be open to spiritual guidance.

The Purple Circle is also a reminder that there is more to life than what we can see or touch. It encourages us to explore the mysteries of the universe and seek answers to life's big questions. This card can also represent a need for solitude and introspection, as we connect with our inner selves and explore our spirituality.

In readings, the Purple Circle can indicate a spiritual awakening or a desire to connect with something greater than ourselves. It may also suggest a need to trust our instincts and listen to our inner voice. Overall, the Purple Circle is a card that reminds us to stay open to the mysteries of life and embrace our spiritual journey.
